duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for the computer-aided engineering activity for vehicle programs and planning and execution of the durability CAE tasks.
Provide program risk assessment and conduct CAE reviews.
Interact with the design and test engineers.
Perform up-front architecture concept development and assess multiple CAE concepts for Durability virtual analysis performance.
Balance CAE concepts for cost and performance, and conduct CAE analysis using Nastran, Abaqus, and nCode.
Review results, provide design guidance and risk assessment for multiple CAE design concepts and interact with sciences, architecture, design, and other extended teams.
Enhance process, tools, and methods for up-front architecture development.

skills.skill: Experience with iSight and/or modeFrontier optimization codes
Experience with fatigue codes like E/Fatigue/FEMFAT
Good knowledge of vehicle structures and manufacturing processes
Concepts creation using CAE morphing tools
CAD tools for basic data handling

education_certification.credential: Master of Science degree in Structural/Mechanical Engineering from an ABET accredited or equivalent program
